title: Document how to write custom screen saver effects
description:
Create documentation explaining how to write custom effects for the screen-saver web component. Should cover:
- Effect base class and required methods (start, destroy, updateText)
- Animation loop patterns with requestAnimationFrame
- Handling reduced motion preferences
- External dependency loading (like Three.js)
- Configuration via data attributes
- Scene composition with multiple layers
- Examples from the advanced effects (tunnel, slideshow, snow)
close_reason: Created comprehensive documentation in docs/writing-effects.md covering Effect base class, animation patterns, external dependencies, data attributes, scene composition, and best practices
